chart.title: Share of the population using the Internet

chart.citation: International Telecommunication Union (ITU), via World Bank (2025)

Individuals using the Internet (% of pop.titleShort: Share of the population using the Internet
Individuals using the Internet (% of pop.titleLong: Share of the population using the Internet - International Telecommunication Union
Individuals using the Internet (% of pop.descriptionShort: Share of the population who used the Internet in the last three months.
descriptionKey: An Internet user is defined by the International Telecommunication Union as anyone who has accessed the Internet from any location in the last three months.
This can be from any type of device, including a computer, mobile phone, personal digital assistant, games machine, digital TV, and other technological devices.
Individuals using the Internet (% of pop.citationShort: International Telecommunication Union (ITU), via World Bank (2025) – with minor processing by Our World in Data
